activities: Aid managers of commercial fleets to identify the riskiest drivers in their fleet.  Specific driver information is shared with designated representatives of client and applicable driver. Information is used on an aggregated basis to look at industry trends and for product and service development/support purposes.
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Netherlands, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU DPA (for UK employees); for all other data: we will use JAMS
